text: Azwaj (wives) Nabi ke liye ismein koi muzahiqa (blameworthy) nahin hai ke unke baap, unke betey, unke bhai, unke bhatije, unke bhanje, unke mail-jol ki auratein aur unke mamluk gharon mein aayein. (Aey auraton) tumhein Allah ki nafarmani se parheiz karna chahiye. Allah har cheez par nigaah rakhta hai
